messages.DynamicVariablePowerTools.EnableLinkedVa: Allow generating a list of all dynamic variable definitions linked to a space.
Generates a list of all dynamic variable definitions linked to this space in the Output field.
messages.DynamicVariablePowerTools.EnableLinkedCo: Allow generating a hierarchical list of all dynamic variable components linked to a space.
Generates a hierarchical list of all dynamic variable components linked to this space in the Output field.
messages.DynamicVariablePowerTools.RenameDynamicV: Adds a button to dynamic variables for renaming all matching linked variables.
messages.DynamicVariablePowerTools.DebugInfo.Name: Debug Info
